JobTitle: Finance Operations Consultant, Global Talent Mobility
JobFullDesc: Facebook is seeking a Global Talent Mobility Finance Operations Consultant focused on managing all aspects of Facebook’s Global Talent Mobility budget and costs. We focus on using our unique view into ‘the numbers’ to see trends and opportunities that are developing within Facebook and within related industries. Successful candidates for this team have a bias toward action, have exceptional partnership and communication skills, and know how to balance getting the details right while still moving fast. In this specific role, you will join a team that manages the immigration, tax, and relocation of Facebook’s Global Talent Mobility program. This role is focused on building out the financial operations function. You will gain invaluable experience in a position which offers significant responsibility and interaction with management as well as considerable opportunity to have a large impact within a growing Global Talent Mobility organization.
